articles.title: Britain: Russia targeting SA politicians in disinformation campaign - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The British Foreign Office said on Sunday Russia is using a troll factory to spread disinformation about the war in Ukraine on social media and target politicians across a number of countries including Britain and South Africa.
